events.message: I received the wrong item and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this product does not meet my order.
System has identified this customer query as a Refund request based on keywords provided by the user.
The case has been assigned to the refund specialist team for further assistance with the customer's request.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I will help you with the refund process right away.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the mistake?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and Iâ€™ve attached a clear photo of the product, which is different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund and send you a prepaid return label so you can send the wrong item back to us at no cost.
I appreciate your quick response and the solution sounds good. I will return the item as soon as I receive the label.
The refund has been processed successfully, and a return label was sent to your email. Please let us know if you need any further help.
Just checking in to ensure you were able to return the item and that the refund met your expectations. We are here if you need more assistance.
Since your refund has been issued and no further replies have been received, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
Please take a moment to complete a short survey about your recent support experience. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
